scripts.profile:doctor: npm run build && npx clinic doctor --dest metrics/performance/clinic --autocannon [ -c 50 -d 20 -T 'Load Test - Standard' ] -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
scripts.profile:doctor:open: npm run build && npx clinic doctor --dest metrics/performance/clinic --open --autocannon [ -c 50 -d 20 -T 'Load Test - Standard' ] -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
scripts.profile:doctor:heavy: npm run build && npx clinic doctor --dest metrics/performance/clinic --autocannon [ -c 100 -d 30 -R 500 -T 'Load Test - Heavy' ] -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
scripts.profile:doctor:light: npm run build && npx clinic doctor --dest metrics/performance/clinic --autocannon [ -c 10 -d 10 -T 'Load Test - Light' ] -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
scripts.profile:doctor:stress: npm run build && npx clinic doctor --dest metrics/performance/clinic --autocannon [ -c 200 -d 60 -R 1000 -T 'Stress Test' -B 50 ] -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
scripts.profile:doctor:warmup: npm run build && npx clinic doctor --dest metrics/performance/clinic --autocannon [ -c 50 -d 20 -W [ -c 5 -d 5 ] -T 'Load Test - With Warmup' ] -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
scripts.profile:flame: npm run build && npx clinic flame --dest metrics/performance/clinic --open -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
scripts.profile:bubble: npm run build && npx clinic bubbleprof --dest metrics/performance/clinic --open -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
scripts.profile:heap: npm run build && npx clinic heapprofiler --dest metrics/performance/clinic --open -- node dist/src/infra/main.js
